article: We often see dogs always put their tongues out in summer. But in the past the dogs didn't do so. Long long ago, the dog was very bad .He never did a good deed. One summer day the dog _ into a forest. When he saw the forest was beautiful and clean , a _ idea came to him. Then he brought a great many dirty things to the forest and put _ everywhere. What he did was _ by a monkey who hid _ a big tree. He didn't tell anyone _ the dog did because _ did not know why the dog did so. Several days _ it got hotter and hotter , and the dirty things became rotten .The air smelt _ . Many animals fell ill. All the other animals became angry and tried to find out who had done it and punish him. The money knew _ bad the dog was. So he _ the other animals the truth. They catch up with the dog and _ him eat all the dirty things and _ the forest clean. After that the dog became honest. To remember this, he put his tongue out in _
